short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebBites - Save and manage all your bookmarks with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save, organise and find all your bookmarks with the help of AI.

ğŸ’» Page previews
Get a preview screenshot of all websites you save.

ğŸ“º Adapts to your content
The web is diverse, so why should all sites be treated the same? WebBites knows what type of content you're saving and adapts to it.

ğŸ“° Reader Mode
Remove all the clutter and ads with reader mode, saving your saved sites as text.

ğŸ§ Listen to articles
No time to read? No problem, use state of the art AI to listen to online articles and websites.

ğŸ“¸ Full-page screenshots
Take a full-page screenshot of all websites you save, forever accessible, even if the page is taken down.

ğŸ“ Page annotations
Annotate anything you want directly on the websiteâ€™s screenshot.

ğŸ“Ÿ Auto-generated metadata
Each page you save is automatically categorised into tags, keywords and colours to help you organise your digital life.

ğŸ” Smart search
Full-text page search, tags, auto-generated keywords, comments, and even colours can be used to search.

--------

Changelog

28/06/24 - v1.3.2
- Disable 'drag & drop image' panel.
- Improved overall mobile experience.

27/06/24 - v1.3.0
- Added the following features:
  - Listen to articles.
  - Get a distraction free reading experience with the new 'reading mode'.
  - Get summaries and TL;DR of articles and websites.
  - Listen to summaries.

- New floating quick actions, press J, or change it to any shortcut you like.
- New suggested actions that appears when an article is detected.
- Option to disable quick and/or suggested actions all together.

07/02/24
- Fixed but that appeared when you visited webbites.io where it would refresh the page indefinitely.

16/02/24 
- Update notification styles and messages to make it clearer to understand.
- Fixed other small bugs.
